name: Lock Picker
description: Lockpicker is a game I wrote as a project for FBLA. It was written in Lua using the pico-8 game fantasy console. It has gameplay like wordle or mastermind. I'm aware the game is very hard with only 4 guesses per lock but have fun and challenge yourself and try to top your friends and get into the local hall of fame. I planned to add more but just didn't have the time.  But I am happy with the final product of the game as it's in a working state with little to no known bugs. If you find any, please let me know in the comments on this page :)
